interface.description: Devices containing an array of analog outputs.

field.name: Analog Output %1%
field.description: Momentary output value for output number %1%.

field.name: Analog Output %1%, Raw
field.description: Momentary raw binary output value for output number %1%.

field.name: Analog Output %1%, Bits
field.description: Number of bits of precision of output value for output number %1%.

field.name: Analog Output %1%, Range, Low
field.description: Lowest possible value for output number %1%.

field.name: Analog Output %1%, Range, High
field.description: Highest possible value for output number %1%.

field.name: Analog Output Count
field.description: Number of analog outputs available on the device.

sensorData.comment:
The output values must be reported using the correct precision and unit. Examples of units that could be used:
* `%` - for instance 0-100 % * `mA` - for instance 4-20 mA * `V` - for instance 0-10 V

parameter.name: Analog Output %1%, Raw
parameter.description: Desired raw state of output number %1%. The int version must always be supported. If the range supports numbers larger than that supported by the int type, the device must also support the long version.
